title: I mis-typed my email address when I signed up
body: When I signed up I typed too fast and realized afterwards my email address was incorrect, and I can't change my email address with my pw (I'm assuming because I haven't verified my email, which I can't) Somehow, this misspelled email address is actually an address. But basically I am wondering if there is anyway I can change the address?

replies.body:
You know what? This EXACT thing just happened to me with Marvel Heroes xD! I accidentally typed yahool.com instead of yahoo.com lol.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

No worries though! As long as you're able to verify yourself as the original account creator with the questions provided, you should be able to get that email updated by shooting us a ticket through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). 

Some of the questions might seem difficult, but we need to be 100% sure that a hacker isn't trying to change your account, so do your best to answer those questions even if the answer might be wrong!

LMFAO, wow ok, so I promise I am not a hacker but get this. I can just change my email address. I feel so dumb, I guess I just had to play a little bit of matches or wait a few days before it let me change my address. And I have verified it and stuff. Ty for your time- if you are still worried I am a hacker or something just let me know if I need to do anything and I will do whatever is needed.
Thank you so much! I will head over and do that now
